verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Jonath elem rehokim. A Mikhtam of David,) (when the Philistines seized him in Gath.) Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> for <S%H582>man<s%> has <S%H9575>trampled<s%> upon me; <S%H3898>Fighting<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long he <S%H3905>oppresses<s%> me.
My <S%H9596>foes<s%> have <S%H9575>trampled<s%> upon me <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long, For they are <S%H7227>many<s%> who <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H4791>proudly<s%> against me.
<S%H3117>When<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> I will <S%H982>put<s%> my <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thee.

In <S%H430>God,<s%> whose <S%H1697>word<s%> I <S%H1984>praise,<s%> In <S%H430>God<s%> I have <S%H982>put<s%> my <S%H982>trust;<s%> I shall not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> can [mere] <S%H1320>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me?
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long they <S%H6087>distort<s%> my <S%H1697>words;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H5921>against<s%> me for <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
They <S%H9075>attack,<s%> they <S%H6845>lurk,<s%> They <S%H8104>watch<s%> my <S%H6119>steps,<s%> As they have <S%H6960>waited<s%> [to take] my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5608>taken<s%> <S%H5608>account<s%> of my <S%H5112>wanderings;<s%> <S%H7760>Put<s%> my <S%H1832>tears<s%> in Thy <S%H4997>bottle;<s%> Are [they] not in Thy <S%H9374>book<s%>?

<S%H227>Then<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>call;<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> I <S%H3045>know,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> is for me.
In <S%H430>God<s%> I have <S%H982>put<s%> my <S%H982>trust,<s%> I shall not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me?
Thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> are [binding] upon me, O <S%H430>God;<s%> I will <S%H9608>render<s%> <S%H8426>thank<s%> <S%H8426>offerings<s%> to Thee.

For Thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H3808>Indeed<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>stumbling,<s%> So that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
